meaningMnemonic: Sticking out of the <radical>dirt</radical>, there's a <radical>cross</radical> adorned with <radical>flowers</radical> and <radical>shellfish</radical> shells. This is a <kanji>tomb</kanji>. The flowers and shellfish were put here as decorations and to honor the dead that currently lie under the dirt. And the cross marks the tomb, obviously.
readingMnemonic: This is a <kanji>tomb</kanji>, but it feels really <reading>fun</reading> (ふん). Decorated with flowers and shellfish shells, it’s not a sad place at all. It's a fun place to remember all the fun times with people you loved.
